content: chore: adaptations for nightly-2025-02-01 #21319 Please review this PR. At the end of the month this diff will land in .
Various merge conflicts to get there, but at the end of the day, nothing to see here.
Johan seems to have been not merging PRs which only change lean-toolchain and a few commit IDs in lake-manifest.json. Are there arguments either way here?

I think it's fine either way for these. If we don't want to merge one like this, just add the :fast_forward: emoji.

On the other hand --- in the days immediately before a release, there's slightly more value in merging all of these individually.
